column1: #Text=But I 'm a great bridge between your world and mine !
#Text=I wish I could talk , but I am very busy .
#Text=You know , you 're really pretty , for a spirit .
#Text=I do n't meet too many spirits , but the ones I do meet , not very attractive .
#Text=" Katara says : " Thank you , but - " Aang says : " You seem familiar too .
#Text=" Katara says : " A lot of people say that .
#Text=" Aang says : " No , you really seem familiar .
#Text=" Katara says : " Look , I really should get going .
#Text=" Aang says : " You 're the Painted Lady ?
#Text=" Katara says : " I was n't her at first , I was just trying to help the village .
#Text=But since everyone thought that 's who I was anyway , I guess I just kinda became her .
#Text=" Aang says : " So you 've been sneaking out at night ?
#Text=" Katara says : " He might be sick of the purple berries I 've been feeding him , but other than that he 's fine !
#Text=" Aang says : " I ca n't believe you lied to everyone , so you could help these people .
#Text=" Katara says : " I 'm sorry , I know I should n't have ... " Aang says : " No , I think it 's great !
#Text=" Katara says : " Well , if you wan na help , there 's one more thing I have to do .
#Text=" Aang says : " You wan na destroy this factory ?
#Text=Sokka was just kidding , but he was right .
#Text=Getting rid of this factory is the only way to help these people permanently .
